all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Hearken, O ye people of my church, to whom the kingdom has been given; hearken ye and give ear to him who laid the foundation of the earth, who made the heavens and all the hosts thereof, and by whom all things were made which live, and move, and have a being.
Doctrine and Covenants 45:1
Quote of the Day
"The healthy, fruitful tree of faith requires intentional effort. And a vital part of that effort is making sure we are firmly rooted in Christ."
Dieter F. Uchtdorf | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
